name: Naval Defense
description:
My submission to the Godot Wild Jam #41.

Defend various islands from dangerous pirates.

Please use the desktop-version for much better performance. The sound in the browser-version is not working very well.
You can report bugs in the comments. Any feedback is highly appreciate :)

Special Keys:

  • N: next music-track
  • M: (un)mute game

Hint:

There is a hidden fishing-minigame.
Follow the crank!
You can earn some money with the fish.

Gitlab-Repo: https://gitlab.com/whiteshampoo/godotwildjam41
